languages.text: {n}Ваше внимание привлекает хмурый рыжебородый мужчина с цепкими черными глазами. На протяжении всего разговора он сверлил вас странным оценивающим взглядом, а сейчас поспешил скрыться за спинами зевак. Вы замечаете его, спешным шагом направляющегося вглубь туннелей.{/n}

{n}A sullen, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. His oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up the whole time you were speaking, but now he has hastened to conceal himself behind the gawkers. The next thing you know, you are watching him hurry deeper into the tunnels.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше внимание привлекает хмурый рыжебородый мужчина с цепкими черными глазами. На протяжении всего разговора он сверлил вас странным оценивающим взглядом, а сейчас поспешил скрыться за спинами зевак. Вы замечаете его, спешным шагом направляющегося вглубь туннелей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A gloomy-faced, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. Throughout your conversation, his oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up. Now he's hastened to hide behind the backs of the gapers. Next, you notice him headed deeper into the tunnels at a quick pace.{/n}

{n}A gloomy-faced, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. Throughout your conversation, his oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up. Now he's hastened to hide behind the backs of the gapers. Next, you notice him headed deeper into the tunnels at a quick pace.{/n}

{n}A sullen, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. His oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up the whole time you were speaking, but now he has hastened to conceal himself behind the gawkers. The next thing you know, you are watching him hurry deeper into the tunnels.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un hombre taciturno de barba pelirroja y sagaces ojos negros llama tu atención. Su mirada curiosamente penetrante parecía medirte a lo largo de tu conversación, pero ahora se ha ocultado apresuradamente entre los curiosos. Para cuando vuelves a verlo, se está adentrando a buen paso en los túneles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sullen, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. His oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up the whole time you were speaking, but now he has hastened to conceal himself behind the gawkers. The next thing you know, you are watching him hurry deeper into the tunnels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre taciturno de barba pelirroja y sagaces ojos negros llama tu atención. Su mirada curiosamente penetrante parecía medirte a lo largo de tu conversación, pero ahora se ha ocultado apresuradamente entre los curiosos. Para cuando vuelves a verlo, se está adentrando a buen paso en los túneles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}黒く鋭い目つきをした不機嫌そうな赤ひげの男があなたの注意を引く。彼の異様なまでに鋭い視線は、あなたが話している間はあなたを見定めようとしているようだったが、今は慌てたように見物人の後ろに身を隠している。次に見えたのは、男がトンネルの奥深くへと急ぐ姿だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sullen, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. His oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up the whole time you were speaking, but now he has hastened to conceal himself behind the gawkers. The next thing you know, you are watching him hurry deeper into the tunnels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黒く鋭い目つきをした不機嫌そうな赤ひげの男があなたの注意を引く。彼の異様なまでに鋭い視線は、あなたが話している間はあなたを見定めようとしているようだったが、今は慌てたように見物人の後ろに身を隠している。次に見えたのは、男がトンネルの奥深くへと急ぐ姿だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}人群之中，某个面色阴沉的红胡子男人引起了你的注意，他的黑眼睛异常锐利。在你说话的整个过程中，那个男人古怪而锐利的目光似乎一直都在打量着你，但随后，他就遁入了人群之中。你注意到他匆忙钻进了隧道深处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sullen, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. His oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up the whole time you were speaking, but now he has hastened to conceal himself behind the gawkers. The next thing you know, you are watching him hurry deeper into the tunnels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人群之中，某个面色阴沉的红胡子男人引起了你的注意，他的黑眼睛异常锐利。在你说话的整个过程中，那个男人古怪而锐利的目光似乎一直都在打量着你，但随后，他就遁入了人群之中。你注意到他匆忙钻进了隧道深处。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein mürrischer Mann mit rotem Bart und wachen schwarzen Augen erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit. Sein eigentümlich stechender Blick hat dich die ganze Zeit gemustert, während du sprachst, doch nun hat er sich eilig hinter die Gaffer zurückgezogen. Als du das nächste Mal zu ihm hinsiehst, eilt er bereits tiefer in die Tunnel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sullen, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. His oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up the whole time you were speaking, but now he has hastened to conceal himself behind the gawkers. The next thing you know, you are watching him hurry deeper into the tunnels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein mürrischer Mann mit rotem Bart und wachen schwarzen Augen erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit. Sein eigentümlich stechender Blick hat dich die ganze Zeit gemustert, während du sprachst, doch nun hat er sich eilig hinter die Gaffer zurückgezogen. Als du das nächste Mal zu ihm hinsiehst, eilt er bereits tiefer in die Tunnel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un homme au visage sombre, à la barbe rousse et aux yeux noirs attire votre attention. Tout au long de votre conversation, il vous a semblé que son regard étrangement perçant vous jaugeait, mais quand vous vous tournez vers lui, il s'empresse de se dissimuler dans la foule. Vous le perdez de vue un instant, puis le voyez ensuite s'enfoncer à vive allure dans les tunnels.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sullen, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. The next thing you know, you are watching him hurry deeper into the tunnels.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Keskin siyah gözlerle bakan, kızıl sakallı somurtkan bir adam dikkatini çekiyor. Tuhaf bir şekilde delici bakışları, konuşmanın başından sonuna dek seni ölçüp tartmış gibi görünüyor. Şimdiyse adam, meraklı gözlerin ardında saklanmak için adımlarını sıklaştırıyor. Ardından bir daha baktığında adamı, tünellerin derinlerine doğru alelacele ilerlerken görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sullen, red-bearded man with keen black eyes draws your attention. His oddly piercing gaze seemed to size you up the whole time you were speaking, but now he has hastened to conceal himself behind the gawkers. The next thing you know, you are watching him hurry deeper into the tunnels.{/n}
